string: ALTER TABLE `welder_certificates` CHANGE `recertification_in_year` `recertification_in_year` DECIMAL(11,0) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0';
ALTER TABLE `welder_certificates` CHANGE `renewal_in_year` `renewal_in_year` DECIMAL(11,0) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0';
ALTER TABLE `welder_certificates` CHANGE `horizon` `horizon` DECIMAL(10,0) NULL DEFAULT '0';
